ban.title: User has been banned
ban.description: User has been banned from this server

unban.title: User has been unbanned from the server
unban.description: You have unbanned a user from this server

mute.title: Participant was muted
mute.description: Participant has been muted on this server

unmute.title: Participant was disabled
unmute.description: Participant has been unmuted on this server

unwarn.title: User has been banned
unwarn.description: The warning has been removed from the user
unwarn.self_error: You cannot remove the warning from yourself

kick.title: Participant was kicked
kick.description: Participant was kicked from the server

clear.title: Posts have been deleted
clear.description: You have deleted messages in the channel

server_warns.title: All alerts on the server
server_warns.description:
To remove a warning, use the command:
`/moderation remove-warning <case-number>`.
You can find the case number when viewing user alerts or server alerts (if you are viewing the second option, the case number is the number according to the account in embed)
server_warns.not_warns: There are no warnings on the server yet

user_warns.title: All Participant Warnings
user_warns.description:
To remove a warning, use the command:
`/moderation remove-warning <case-number>`.
You can find the case number when viewing user alerts or server alerts (if you are viewing the second option, the case number is the number according to the account in embed)
